features: Silicone Small Spatula, Red Beautifully ice your cakes, cupcakes, and more with this quality spatula
ideal for removing baked goods or casseroles
Made of durable, heat resistant silicone, this spatula won't warp, stain
Flexible and thin, it is perfect for reaching into deep jars and scraping the edges of bowls
Features a soft, comfortable handle for easy gripping
description: Item #3133R Silicone Small Spatula, Red Beautifully ice your cakes, cupcakes, and more with this quality spatula. Also ideal for removing baked goods or casseroles from dishes without breaking or crumbling. Made of durable, heat resistant silicone, this spatula won't warp, stain, or retain odors. Flexible and thin, it is perfect for reaching into deep jars and scraping the edges of bowls. Features a soft, comfortable handle for easy gripping. Measures 10.5in/26.5cm. Hand washing recommended.
